author: igors
title: Stableshift: efficient AMM exchange
description: Low capital usage efficiency, price slippage and impermanent loss are common problems of AMM exchanges. How can we solve this in Cardano?
solution: Stableshift team is building an AMM protocol based on token portfolios, with low price slippage and high APY to attract more Cardano users.
experience: The team launched Liquifi protocol in BSC and Ethereum in 2020/21, a prototype of the Stableshift protocol for Cardano - in October 2021.
